document.full_text: pakistan's opposition leader accused the powerful spy agency of negligence and incompetence on wednesday as the country's former president said rogue members of the security establishment may have helped osama bin laden hide for years near islamabad.
document.title: more pressure on pakistani military over bin laden
lines_and_colors: pakistan's opposition leader accused the powerful spy agency of negligence and incompetence on wednesday as the country's former president said rogue members of the security establishment may have helped osama bin laden hide for years near islamabad.
